<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81847</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81847</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4736</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Opening School Year Liturgy</string>
            <string language="es">Liturgia anual para la apertura de la escuela</string>
            <string language="ga">Liotúirge i gcomhair Oscailt na Scoilbhliana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Öffnung Schuljahr-Liturgie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liturgie d'Année Scolaire d'Ouverture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Liturgy Do Ano De Escola Da Abertura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Liturgy Di Anno scolastico Di Apertura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοίγοντας λειτουργία σχολικού έτους</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A comprehensive collection of Scripture Readings, Hymns, Reflections and Prayers that may be of assistance in planning opening school year liturgies.</string>
            <string language="es">Una amplia colección de las Lecturas de las Escrituras, himnos, reflexiones y oraciones que pueden resultar de ayuda en las liturgias anuales de la apertura de la escuela.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bailiúchán cuimsitheach de Sliochtaí ón Scrioptúr, Iomainn, Machnaimh agus Paidreacha a d’fhéadfadh bheith cabhrach i bpleanáil liotúirgí oscailte na scoilbhliana.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine komplette Ansammlung Scripture Messwerte, 
Hymnen, Reflexionen und Gebete, die von der Unterstützung in 
den Planung Öffnung Schuljahrliturgien sein können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection complète de lectures, d'hymnes, 
de réflexions et de prières de Scripture qui peuvent être d'aide 
dans des liturgies d'année scolaire d'ouverture de planification.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção detalhada das leituras, dos hymns, 
das reflexões e dos prayers de Scripture que podem ser do auxílio em
liturgies do ano de escola da abertura do planeamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione completa di letture, di hymns, di 
riflessioni e di preghiere di Scripture che possono essere di 
assistenza nei liturgies di anno scolastico di apertura di 
progettazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια περιεκτική συλλογή των αναγνώσεων Scripture, των
ύμνων, των αντανακλάσεων και των προσευχών που μπορεί να είναι 
βοήθειας στον προγραμματισμό των ανοίγοντας λειτουργιών σχολικού 
έτους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
